text: Luis Antonio Herrera Campins (4 May 1925 â€“ 9 November 2007) was the President of Venezuela from 1979 to 1984. He was elected to one five-year term in 1978. He was a member of COPEI, a Christian Democratic party. Category:1925 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Presidents of Venezuela
title: Luis Herrera Campins
